Posts.Content: Hi there, I am 18 years old and I am sexually active. For about 3months now I have been having nipple discharge and reallly saw and itchy nipples.I have a rash on my thighs and my back and randomly all over my body. Even on my face, it's red and blotchy looking and is very saw.   Nipples.... The doctor gave me some antibiotics to take and I did take them but problem has come back again. It dd go for a bit. Skin... I have had exzema prior to this, could this be a link? I am 18 years old and fear that maybe I have breast cancer... the discharge comes from both nipples and today it is a light yellow colour. But it vareis from yellow t dark green to brown and sometimes even blood.  Please help me I am very scared.
Posts.Title: Nipple Discharge and Itchy....
